column.name: IsRetainedEarnings
column.summary: This will be set true for exactly one account, and it can't be changed. On the Balance Sheet report, this special account will also contain the sum of all expenses and income for all previous years.

column.name: CodeStrRequired
column.summary: Comma delimited list of procedure codes that are required for this appt type. E.g. T1234,T4321,N3214.

column.name: RequiredProcCodesNeeded
column.summary: Enum:EnumRequiredProcCodesNeeded 0=None,1=AtLeastOne,2=All

Enumeration.name: EnumRequiredProcCodesNeeded
Enumeration.summary: Governs how many of the ProcCodes on an AppointmentType that are required on an appointment.
Enumeration.EnumValue: No ProcCodes from CodeStrRequired are needed to schedule appointments of this AppointmentType.
At least one ProcCode from CodeStrRequired is needed to schedule appointments of this AppointmentType.
All ProcCodes from CodeStrRequired are needed to schedule appointments of this AppointmentType.

column.name: BlockoutTypes
column.summary: Comma delimited list of Blockout Types (definition.DefNums where definition.Category=25) this appointment type can be associated to.

column.name: Category
column.summary: Enum:DefCat

Enumeration.name: DefCat
Enumeration.summary: Definition Category. Go to the definition setup window (FormDefinitions) in the program to see how each of these categories is used. If you add a category, make sure to add it to the switch statement in DefL so the user can edit it. Add a "NotUsed" description attribute to defs that shouldn't show up in FormDefinitions.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 55 - Operatory Types. This field is only informational. The value isn't used for functionality.

column.name: DischargeDate
column.summary: Used in hospitals. Used to track patients discharge date.

column.name: KeyType
column.summary: Enum:FKeyType

Enumeration.name: FKeyType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 4 Utm Number.

column.name: EServiceCode
column.summary: Enum:eServiceCode EService that this short GUID applies to.

Enumeration.name: eServiceCode
Enumeration.summary: Used by EServiceSignal.ServiceCode. Each service will have an entry here. Stored as an int for forward compatibility.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 42 - Eclipboard Clinical Mobile application.

column.name: FlowNum
column.summary: Primary Key.

column.name: Description
column.summary: Copied from FlowDef.

column.name: PatNum
column.summary: FK to patient.PatNum. The patient this flow is for.

column.name: ClinicNum
column.summary: FK to clinic.ClinicNum. The clinic this patient flow is in. Set to 0 if in headquarters or clinics are disabled.

column.name: SecDateTEntry
column.summary: The DateTime this flow was created. Flows are created when they are started. Not able to edited by the user.

column.name: IsComplete
column.summary: Flow is considered complete if this is true. Used on backend to get incomplete flows without checking FlowActions

column.name: FlowActionNum
column.summary: Primary Key

column.name: FlowNum
column.summary: FK to flow.FlowNum

column.name: ItemOrder
column.summary: Copied from flowActionDef.ItemOrder.

column.name: FlowActionType
column.summary: Enum:EnumFlowActionType

column.name: UserNum
column.summary: FK to userod.UserNum. This is the user that completed the action. If not complete, this will be 0.

column.name: IsComplete
column.summary: True if marked complete, otherwise set to false.

column.name: DateTimeComplete
column.summary: The date and time this action was set complete by the user.

column.name: FlowActionDefNum
column.summary: PK

column.name: FlowDefNum
column.summary: FK to flowdef.FlowDefNum. Defines what flow this action is tied to

column.name: FlowActionType
column.summary: Enum:EnumFlowActionType

column.name: ItemOrder
column.summary: Determines the order the items show in the patientflowactiondef and what order they are to be completed in.

column.name: SecDateTEntry
column.summary: The date this action definition was created. Not able to edited by the user.

column.name: DateTLastModified
column.summary: The date time this action was last changed. Not able to be edited by the user.

column.name: ClinicNum
column.summary: FK to clinic.ClinicNum. Represents the clinic that the flow is tied to, if any. Can be 0.

column.name: Description
column.summary: The name of the flow.

column.name: UserNumCreated
column.summary: FK to userod.UserNum. The user that created this flow. Cannot be edited by user.

column.name: UserNumModified
column.summary: FK to userod.UserNum. The user that last edited this flow. Cannot be edited by user.

column.name: SecDateTEntered
column.summary: Date Time this flow was created. Cannot be edited by user.

column.name: DateLastModified
column.summary: Date time this flow was last edited. Cannot be edited by user.

column.name: FlowDefLinkNum
column.summary: PK

column.name: FlowDefNum
column.summary: FK to flowdef.FlowDefNum.

column.name: Fkey
column.summary: FK to other tables. Dictated by the FKey Type.

column.name: FlowType
column.summary: Enum:EnumFlowType

Enumeration.name: EnumFlowType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 0. Equivalent to no FlowDefLink.
1. Can have an Fkey to AppointmentTypeNum.
2. Always an Fkey to DefNum for billing type.
3. Not currently in use.
4. Not currently in use.
5. Not currenlty in use.

column.name: PermType
column.summary: Enum:Permissions Some permissions will treat a zero FKey differently. Some denote it as having access to everything for that PermType. I.e. Reports.

Enumeration.name: Permissions
Enumeration.summary: A hard-coded list of permissions which may be granted to usergroups.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 237 - Allows user to delete appointments.
238 - Allows user to delete completed appointments.
239 - Logs when Appointment Types are edited. For audit trails only.
240 - Allows users to edit tendlc brand information

column.name: CodeSet
column.summary: Enum:InterventionCodeSet AboveNormalWeight, BelowNormalWeight, TobaccoCessation, Nutrition, PhysicalActivity, Dialysis.

Enumeration.name: InterventionCodeSet
Enumeration.summary: Value sets for interventions. This will limit the codes in FormInterventionEdit to a smaller list of codes and allow us to recommend codes to meet specific CQMs.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 6 - None

column.name: OperatoryType
column.summary: FK to definition.DefNum. The type of the Operatory. This value is not normally used, but rather to just mark which type the Operatory is.

column.name: WebSchedDescript
column.summary: The description of the provider that is displayed to patients in Web Sched.

column.name: FieldName
column.summary: Enum:RequiredFieldName

Enumeration.name: RequiredFieldName
Enumeration.summary: This enum is stored as a string, so the order of values can be rearranged.

column.name: ConditionType
column.summary: Enum:RequiredFieldName

Enumeration.name: RequiredFieldName
Enumeration.summary: This enum is stored as a string, so the order of values can be rearranged.

column.name: PermType
column.summary: Enum:Permissions

Enumeration.name: Permissions
Enumeration.summary: A hard-coded list of permissions which may be granted to usergroups.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 237 - Allows user to delete appointments.
238 - Allows user to delete completed appointments.
239 - Logs when Appointment Types are edited. For audit trails only.
240 - Allows users to edit tendlc brand information

column.name: IType
column.summary: Enum:InvalidType Indicates what cache or entity has been changed.

Enumeration.name: InvalidType
Enumeration.summary: When the autorefresh message is sent to the other computers, this is the type.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 107. Used as template for Patient Flows
108. Used as template for Patient Flow Actions
109. Used to link PatientFlowDefs with other objects: appointments, appt types, billing types, etc.

column.name: UtmNum
column.summary: Primary key.

column.name: CampaignName
column.summary: Text that identifies a specific campaign or promotion identifying why traffic is being directed to the users website.

column.name: MediumInfo
column.summary: Text that tracks how traffic is getting to the users website, such as email or social media.

column.name: SourceInfo
column.summary: Text that identifies where traffic is originating from.

column.name: Rule
column.summary: Enum:RuleType Allow, AllowWithInput, AllowWithMessage, Block.

column.name: WebSchedDescript
column.summary: The description of the provider that is displayed to patients in Web Sched.

column.name: Rule
column.summary: Enum:RuleType Allow, AllowWithInput, AllowWithMessage, Block.
